# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the feature extractor that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing a feature extractor type

- **description**: A text representation of the feature extractor.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the feature extractor shown in a playground.
